repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: Seventy-two letters from Jaime Arando to his father, Francisco Arando, dating from 1937-1940. Jaime Arando was active on the Ebro Front, spent time in a concentration camp, and later joined the National Army.

langmaterial.language: The material is in Spanish and Castilian.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seventy-two letters from Jaime Arando to his father, Francisco Arando, dating from 1937-1940. Jaime Arando was active on the Ebro Front, spent time in a concentration camp, and later joined the National Army.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jaime Arando was a Republican soldier with the 30th Mountain Infantry Regiment during the Spanish Civil War.
